title: Lag but fps/ping are really good
body:
Hello,

Lately when im playing League im having some wierd ''lag'' autoattacks, healthbars, manabars, (summoner)spells etc sometimes have a (small) delay from 0,2 to 2 seconds. And after those seconds I see everything happening in a really fast tempo.. Does anyone know a fix?

Greetings summoners.

replies.body:
It sounds like you're experiencing small bursts of packet loss. Since all actions displayed in the match are interpreted from data inside the packets you and the other players send to the server, if there are losses or delays in these packets hitting your PC, it can cause delays in what you see. I suggest taking a look at our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for a list of steps that should resolve this.

Let me know if these issues persist.
